Subject: Raising Kind and Conscious Kids
Description: With so many influences in our kids' lives, how to we give them the tools to make kind and conscious decisions both for themselves and in how they treat and interact with others?  How do we help them to understand and navigate the subtle pressures of the media, their peers, other adults?  How do we help them understand that intent isn't magic, and fair does not always mean equitable?  Speakers include:Biz Nidjam, Jen Talley, Ruth Suehle - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
